notes.1: These ROMs require an older version MAME. They test fine in MAME 0.139 (Mame 2010 in RetroArch). This is typically due to a missing decryption key, dl-1425.bin qsound rom, or other ROM files that the older MAME did not strictly require.
notes.2: These ROMs require an older version MAME. They test fine in MAME 0.78 (Mame 2003 in RetroArch). This is typically due to a missing decryption key, dl-1425.bin qsound rom, or other ROM files that the older MAME did not strictly require.
notes.3: These are using an older naming convention to allow recognition by the targeted MAME version.
notes.4: These ROMs are only present if your Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection says it is 'International'.
notes.5: This ROM is not extracted as no known emulators can play it as is due to the missing key and being a newer post-MAME2010 split.
